original: Callerström, Ernst Harald, överste, Göteborg, f. 21/1/97 i Påskallavik, Kalmar 1., av grosshandl. Nils C. o. Lotty Boldt-Christmas. G. 25 m. Rut Bergman. Barn: Gunnar f. 29, Jan 34. — Fänrik v. kustart. 17, löjtn. 19, kapt. 32, major 39, öv:löjtn. 42, överste 46. KSHS stabskurs 24-25, adjut. i chefens f. kustart. stab 28-37, tjg. v. för-sv:stab. 37-40, stabschef v. kustart :-insp. 40-44, lär. v. KSS 31-42, chef f. Gbgs kustart :försvar o. Älvsb. kustart :reg. sed. 46. Delt. i utarb. av 36 års försv:prop., av 41 års försv :uit-redn., av 42 års försv :prop. Red. o. ansv. utg. av Tids-kr. f. Kustart. 43-44. RSO, RNO, RVO, LKrVA, LÖS.
translated: Callerström, Ernst Harald, colonel, Gothenburg, born January 21st, 1897, in Påskallavik, Kalmar County, the son of the merchant Nils C. and Lotty Boldt-Christmas. He married Rut Bergman in 1925 and they had two children, Gunnar (born 1929) and Jan (born 1934). Callerström served as an ensign in the coastal artillery in 1917, lieutenant in 1919, captain in 1932, major in 1939, lieutenant colonel in 1942, and colonel in 1946. He attended the KSHS staff course in 1924-1925, was adjutant in the chief of the coastal artillery staff in 1928-1937, served at the Defense Staff in 1937-1940, was chief of staff at the coastal artillery inspectorate in 1940-1944, taught at the KSS military academy in 1931-1942, and was commander of the Gothenburg coastal artillery defense and the Älvsborg coastal artillery regiment from 1946. He contributed to the development of the 1936 defense proposal, the 1941 defense committee report, and the 1942 defense proposal. He was the editor and responsible publisher of the Coastal Artillery Times in 1943-1944. He was awarded the RSO, RNO, RVO, LKrVA, and LÖS for his services.
